participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Creative and ambitious, always looking for new ways to express myself through art and music.
participant_1.background: My painting is my passion, and a Corvette would be the icing on the cake. I am a rapper. I broke my nose in 5th grade. I write children's books. I am studying for my masters.

participant_2.name: Amelia
participant_2.personality: Energetic and playful, I love to stay active and enjoy the little things in life.
participant_2.background: I love how the rhythm of hip hop beats can get my whole body moving. I enjoy playing retro video games on my 386. I am short for my age, but I am strong and fit. In my free time, I enjoy cloud watching. I'm a city girl at heart, but I'm not afraid to get my nails done and compete.

content.text: I am good, just trying to get through my homework. How about you?
I am good, just doing some cloud watching.
That sounds fun, I have always enjoyed looking at the clouds.
Me too, they have so much beauty to them. Do you like anything else artistic?
Yes, I love painting. I am actually a rapper as well.
Really? I love hip hop music. What is your name?
I go by 'The Artist'. What about you?
I go by 'The Cloud'. I love playing retro video games on my 386.
That is awesome. I love the old games as well.
Do you have any video game systems?
Yes, I have a Nintendo 64 and a Sega Genesis.
Nice! I have a Nintendo 64 as well. I love playing Mario Kart on that system.
Me too! Mario Kart is so much fun.
It really is. I love playing with friends.
Me too. I hope you have a great rest of your day.
You too! It was nice talking to you.
